/usr/bin/clang++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX14.4.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/RecipeForADisaster.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/RecipeForADisaster.dir/src/recipe.cpp.o CMakeFiles/RecipeForADisaster.dir/src/recipeManager.cpp.o -o RecipeForADisaster
